response.answer_text: Yes, I believe they are. When there are new ways of looking at things there exists the possibility of discovering new things that weren’t even thought of. Usually, knowledge increases in small steps, but then along comes a paradigm shift knowledge takes on a new direction. I believe that these leaps in knowledge are very important and they are partly responsible for rapid changes we are experiencing.
A paradigm shift may or may not be useful it's often according to the views promoted by the change.
